brief.content-text:
Diagram 1, Image

The diagram depicts the system properties windows from a Windows operating system. There are several tabs at the top of the page. The Computer Name tab has been selected. For a machine to be recognized on the network, information is needed about the computer. Description, full computer name, and workgroup assignment are entered. For instance, on a Windows XP machine, the following computer naming information is displayed:

Computer Description: Desktop PC, Bldg. E, Room 314
Full Computer Name: E 3 1 4 0 0 1
Workgroup: WORKGROUP
